Hi my name is Sudhanshu Tripathi.

 
I am currently persuing my Degree in Computer Science and Engineering. I did my schooling from Prayagraj. I am keen learner i love to learn new things and love to travel for days. 

Currently i am learning Android Development and trying my best to get my dream job i have Knowledge in languages like C++ - Python - Kotlin and OOPS concept. 

I have done my Project in Machine Learning where we build a model which use Linear Regression algorithm to predict Market price of house in surrounding. I love to play Vollyball and PC games
